content:

jameysharp commented on issue #5383:

Oh. When I first wrote the bindings_for function it was in another module and I didn't want to make the TupleIndex internals public, so I wrote the IntoIterator implementation as a more limited thing, and found it was useful in several places. Then I moved bindings_for here and started using it everywhere but didn't notice that it became the only user of that iterator.

This is one reason why we do code review, I guess!
